Larry Allen - Council Member Place 5
====================================

The Sunnyvale Town Council holds regular public meetings at 7 p.m. on the 2nd and 4th Monday of each month at Town Hall. The Council may also call special meetings. All meetings are posted in accordance with the Open Meetings Act. Check the
meeting calendar
for updated meeting information.

Contact Larry
-------------

* [Email Larry Allen - Council Member Place 5](mailto:councilmember.allen@townofsunnyvale.org "Contact Councilmember Larry Allen")
* Town Hall
  127 N. Collins Rd.
  Sunnyvale, TX 75182
* Phone: (972) 226-7177
